resources.string: ***UNDER CONSTRUCTION*** We will present a list of literal audiobooks retrieved from data base named dbLibAudioFiles. Audio books will be creations of users and downloaded audios from internet. You will choose one book from the list and tapping the PLAY button you can listen the audio with MediaPlayer(public constructor) to play the audio back.

***UNDER CONSTRUCTION*** We will present a list of poems as audiopoems retrieved from data base named dbLibAudioFiles. Audio poems will be creations of users and downloaded audios from internet . You will choose one poem from the list and tapping the PLAY button you can listen the audio with MediaPlayer(public constructor) to play the audio back.

***UNDER CONSTRUCTION*** We will present a way to record every user his voice. Using MediaRecorder to record an audio file and calling start() and stop() respectively. Then the new audio files will stored to the data base dbLibAudioFiles.
